title: ASOS HIT BY FALLING PROFITS; DIGEST
body:
Asos is due to admit that pre-tax profits tumbled by 69% to £31.3m after a series of mis-steps. Although sales are 
thought to have risen 12% to £2.6bn, a string of profit warnings have pushed the online retailer's shares close to a 
five-year low. They closed at £25.75, valuing it at £2.2bn.
